data.comment: Today's referee, Alexandre Boucaut, has blown to start the match.
Kerim Mrabti puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 6, Great play from Gustav Engvall to set up the goal.
Paul Onuachu (Genk) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Joakim Maehle with an assist there.
The first-half is over at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 45, Mechelen's Joachim Van Damme has been booked in Genk.
The second-half is underway in Genk.
In the minute 55, Goal! Junya Ito gives Genk a 2-1 lead in Genk.
Gerardo Arteaga instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team replace Kerim Mrabti with Nikola Storm.
In the minute 66, Maryan Shved is replacing Rob Schoofs for Mechelen at Luminus Arena.
Goal! Paul Onuachu extends Genk's lead to 3-1 in Genk with a header.
That's a fine assist from Junya Ito.
In the minute 73, Mechelen make their third substitution with William Togui replacing Gustav Engvall.
Dries Wouters is on a sub for Patrik Hrosovsky for Genk.
Bastien Toma (Genk) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Mats Moller Daehli.
In the minute 85, Kouassi Eboue is replacing Jhon Lucumi for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
